Inspection: shortening of the thigh, symmetry of skin folds

Search for abduction limitations (norm > 60°)

Search for hip instability: Barlow manoeuvre (jerk)

properties.question: What is the primary method used to screen for congenital hip dislocation in infants during a routine health examination?
properties.option_b: Inspecting for symmetry of skin folds and searching for abduction limitations (norm > 60°)
properties.option_c: Listening for heart murmurs with a stethoscope
properties.option_d: Measuring blood pressure to check for orthopedic issues
